mapper.select: SELECT notice_idx , userinfo_id , notice_title , notice_content , notice_img , TO_CHAR(notice_regdate,'yyyy-mm-dd') as notice_regdate , notice_status , notice_viewcnt FROM notice WHERE notice_idx=#{noticeIdx}

SELECT notice_idx , userinfo_id , notice_title , notice_content , notice_img , TO_CHAR(notice_regdate,'yyyy-mm-dd') as notice_regdate , notice_status , notice_viewcnt FROM ( SELECT rownum as rn, notice.* FROM ( SELECT * FROM notice
WHERE notice_title LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
WHERE notice_content LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
ORDER BY notice_idx DESC ) notice ) WHERE rn BETWEEN #{startRow} and #{endRow}
